Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    ch.aplu.android.GGBackground.drawSprite(Bitmap, int, int)
    Use GGBackground.drawImage instead.
    ch.aplu.android.Actor.getRotatedImage(Bitmap, double)
    Use GGBitmap.getRotatedImage instead. GGBitmap.getRotatedImage(Bitmap bitmap, double angle)
    ch.aplu.android.Actor.getScaledImage(Bitmap, double, double)
    Use GGBitmap.getScaledImage instead. GGBitmap.getScaledImage(Bitmap bitmap, double factor, double angle)
    ch.aplu.android.Actor.getZoomedImage(Bitmap, double)
    Use GGBitmap.getZoomedImage instead. GGBitmap.getZoomedImage(Bitmap bitmap, double factor)
